channel.title: Miscs on Antonela Miho
channel.description: Recent content in Miscs on Antonela Miho

item.description: Working Papers Small screen, big echo? Estimating the political persuasion of local television news bias using the Sinclair Broadcast Group as a natural experiment Working paper, last version: November 2022. Abstract: This paper investigates the heterogeneous effect of biased local TV news on political outcomes and opinions in the United States, exploiting the timing of the introduction of biased programming of a conservative-leaning broadcasting company, Sinclair Broadcast Group, over the years 1992-2020.
